name: Nocturne (itch)
description:
Nocturne is a cyberpunk-themed experimental/exploration game. The goal is to simply wander around and enjoy the sights.

This was my first solo 3D game. I made it in about 3 weeks in May, 2016 for a uni assignment. I was heavily inspired by experimental games such as Bernband and wanted to create something similar. It is far from perfect, but I learned a lot from it and decided I'd share it. I think I've improved a lot since I made this :)

I hope you enjoy it anyway haha
